config.taczlabs.title: TaCZ:Labs Settings
config.taczlabs.func.enable_sprinting_sh: You can shoot during sprinting (sprinting will be canceled).
TaCZ:Labs made different crosshair for different guns, 
it also has dynamic effect while moving and shooting.
config.taczlabs.hud.shadow_alpha.desc: Shadow alpha of crosshair. range: 0 ~ 255, default: 128.
config.taczlabs.hud.shadow_offset.desc:
Shadow offset of crosshair, 
range: 0 ~ 3, default 1 .
config.taczlabs.hud.max_spread.desc:
The maximum radius of the collimator diffusion, 0 disables the diffusion animation
(Unrestricted fire jitter). Range: 0 ~ 50, default: 20, in pixels.
config.taczlabs.hud.anim_speed.desc: The speed of the collimator telescoping animation. Range: 5 ~ 30, Default: 12.
config.taczlabs.hud.shooting_spread.desc:
Magnitude of collimation spread according to the recoil at the time of firing.
range 0 ~ 5, default 2.
config.taczlabs.hud.speed_spread.desc:
Maximum value of collimator spread affected by velocity. 
range: 0 ~ 100, default: 100.
Only works when “Inaccuracy Spread” is turned off.
config.taczlabs.hud.inaccuracy_spread: Diffusion crosshair based on real spread
config.taczlabs.hud.inaccuracy_spread.de:
When on, the collimator spread will be displayed 
crosshair according to the true scattering values, 
and when off, it will be additionally combined 
with the combined values such as plane velocity.
config.taczlabs.hud.crosshair.crosshair_: Configure the crosshair for different guns
config.taczlabs.hud.crosshair.each_cross:
Configure the parameters of each 
crosshair in detail, Units 1 pixel.
config.taczlabs.hud.crosshair_length.des:
Anim extent of crosshair, 
range 0.0 ~ 60.0, default 30.0 .
